definitions.definition: An assistant to another person, especially to a superior or more important person.
In literature, theatre, etc., a good foil of the protagonist , a character who helps emphasize the traits of the main character.

main_definition: ( informal ) An assistant to another person, especially to a superior or more important person.
secondary_definitions: ( authorship , figuratively ) In literature, theatre, etc., a good foil of the protagonist , a character who helps emphasize the traits of the main character.
